title: Conduct a Yard Inventory Check
description: The system shows a container should be in a specific location, but the truck driver cannot find it. An operator must verify its physical location.

tasks.description: Receive a report of a 'lost' container and its expected yard location from the TOS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator is notified that container YYYY9876543 cannot be found at location A1-02-03.

tasks.description: Dispatch a yard checker to the location to physically look for the container.
tasks.expected_outcome: A yard checker is sent to the area to investigate.

tasks.description: The checker finds the container in the adjacent slot (A1-02-04) and reports the correct location to have the TOS updated.
tasks.expected_outcome: The checker reports the correct location, and the operator updates the container's position in the system, resolving the issue.
